title: Phaistos
description: An ancient settlement on Crete where occupation began ca. 3000 B.C., Phaistos was a major center of the Minoan civilization and continued to be a Greek city of the first millennium B.C.

properties.description: Circular, stone, pit-like structures built into the ground at the edge of the West Court of the Minoan palace at Phaistos.
properties.title: Kouloures at Phaistos

properties.description: The large, rectangular central court of the Minoan palace of Phaistos, which may have been used for ritual events such as bull leaping
properties.title: Central Court of the Palace at Phaistos
